data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shavrin, Alexey V., Smetana, Aleš (2019): Prosoglypta, a new remarkable genus from Vietnam (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae: Omaliini).
